@xpmule the show probably wouldn't have been cancelled if people would have bought more merch and watched it on the tele more, rather than DL'ing.  Personally I'm here so I can watch it many times until the new season box comes out.  I own them all and all 4 movies to date.  Not that I'm against torrenting, but if you have the money, support what you love or it will surely go away.
